name: Peter Pan 3: The Revival of the Fairies
name_original: Peter Pan 3: The Revival of the Fairies
description:
This is not a new story. This has all happened before, and it will all happen again. For generations, this family has believed and will continue to believe in Peter Pan. But the same cannot be said for the rest of the world...

*NOTE* this game works best on Firefox and Opera. Click here to download Firefox. Click here to download Opera.
